name: WTVMNewsLeader9
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest information from WTVM News Leader 9 Columbus, Georgia within Alexa's Flash Briefing.

Enable this Skill, then say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear the audio.

Feeds include the latest weather forecast for the Columbus, Georgia area from the WTVM News Leader 9 Weather team.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
